action.name: Play/Pause
action.comment: Toggles the current track between playing and pausing.

action.name: Clear Playlist
action.comment: Clears the playlist of all items.

action.name: Back
action.comment: Skips to the start of the last track.

action.name: Forward
action.comment: Skips to the start of the next track.

action.name: Playback Mode
action.comment: Cycles through the playback modes of Noatun.

action.name: Remove Current
action.comment: Removes only the current track from the play list.

action.name: Set Volume
action.comment: Sets the volume to a configurable amount.

argument.comment: The required percentage of the volume.

action.name: Toggle Playlist View
action.comment: Toggles the visiblility of the playlist window.

action.name: Skip To
action.comment: Skips to a configurable point in the current track.

argument.comment: The percentage of the track to move through.
